panels.description:
Service Time Per Second, show service time distribution among different SQL types:
1. Database time, the total time that the TiDB cluster is processing application requests.
2. The service time of different SQL types.
panels.title: Database Time By SQL Type

panels.description:
Service Time Per Second, show service time distribution among different SQL phases.
1. Database time, the total time that the TiDB cluster is processing application requests.
2. The service time of different SQL phases.
panels.title: Database Time By SQL Phase

panels.description:
Service Time Per Second, show service time distribution among different KV/PD request:
1. Execute time, the execute time in SQL Phase
2. Service time  of different KV/PD request
panels.title: SQL Execute Time Overview

panels.description:
TiDB statement statistics.
Bold red line on right Y axis for Failed Queries per second
panels.title: QPS

panels.description: TiDB command total statistics including both successful and failed ones
panels.title: CPS By Type

panels.description: TiDB plan cache hit total.
panels.title: Queries Using Plan Cache OPS

panels.description: kv/tso request total by command type
panels.title: KV/TSO Request OPS

panels.description: kv request time by  command source
panels.title: KV Request Time By Source

panels.description:
1. CPU: CPU utilization for all TiDB instances.
- CPU-Avg: avg(cpu utilization)
- CPU-Delta: max(cpu utilization) - min(cpu utilization)
- CPU-Max: max(cpu utilization)
2. Max memory usage
panels.title: TiDB CPU/Memory

panels.description:
Out traffic statistics From TiDB to the client.
Read Flow between TiKV and Rocksdb.
panels.title: Read Traffic

panels.description: Write traffic statistics between from Client to TiDB , the txn write rate from TiDB to TiKV, and the write flow from TiKV to RocksDB.
panels.title: Write Traffic

panels.description:
- TSO Wait Duration: The duration of a client starting to wait for the TS until received the TS result.
- TSO RPC Duration: The duration of a client sending TSO request until received the response.
- PD Server Handle Time: The time consumed by handling TiDB requests.
panels.title: PD TSO Wait/RPC Duration

panels.description: TiDB query durations
panels.title: Duration

panels.description: TiDB connection idle durations
panels.title: Connection Idle Duration

panels.description: TiDB current connection counts
panels.title: Connection Count

panels.description: The time cost of parsing SQL to AST
panels.title: Parse Duration

panels.description: The time to build plan
panels.title: Compile Duration

panels.description: The time cost of executing the SQL which does not include the time to get the results of the query .
panels.title: Execute Duration

panels.description: tidb avg kv request duration
panels.title: Avg TiDB KV Request Duration

panels.description: The count of different kinds of gRPC message
panels.title: GRPC Message Count

panels.description: The average execution time of gRPC message
panels.title: Average GRPC Message Duration

panels.description: The P99 of execution time of gRPC message
panels.title: GRPC Message Duration P99

panels.description: The time consumed by processing asynchronous write requests
panels.title: Storage Async Write Duration

panels.description: The store time duration of each request
panels.title: Store Duration

panels.description: The apply time duration of each request
panels.title: Apply Duration

panels.description: The time consumed when Raft commits log on each TiKV instance
panels.title: Commit Log Duration Per Server P99

panels.description: The time consumed for Raft to apply logs per TiKV instance
panels.title: Apply Log Duration Per Server P99
